# statusCode

**Instance Property**

The response’s HTTP status code.

## Declaration

```swift
var statusCode: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

See [http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2616.txt] for details.

## Getting response status codes

- **localizedString(forStatusCode:)**: Returns a localized string corresponding to a specified HTTP status code.
